verbs.description: " I [V: was] having fun . They were having fun , " Trump said .
" [ARG0: I] was [V: having] [ARG1: fun] . They were having fun , " Trump said .
" I was having fun . They [V: were] having fun , " Trump said .
" I was having fun . [ARG0: They] were [V: having] [ARG1: fun] , " Trump said .
" [ARG1: I was having fun . They were having fun] , " [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] .
